February 23, 1961
Dear Sam:
The form-letter I hope you will
understand and excuse. The rest of
the enclosures are descriptive material
and a questionnaire which I hope you
will either respond ^o, or direct to
the proper persons with regard particuÂ¬
larly to Iowa University.
Time and funds prevent all the
personal visits which, ideally, should
be made. I wonder if there would be
any possibility of arranging for
several Iowa-area people to meet at
some reasonably central point in the
state? Is the IJCET scheduled for a
meeting soon? Or x^ould a visit with
Mr. Dancer serve the same purpose?
/lUJWW
